name: Clima-Health
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ozone level
des: Air Pollution including particulate matter and ozone has become the fourth leading cause of death globally causing approximately 7 million deaths annually, according to the National Institute of Health 2020 report. In highly polluted areas one can wear a mask to protect from particulate matter like humanity did in the case of COVID19- a deadly virus. However, ozone is a gas and a silent killer, and the only solution is to reduce ozone pollution. We would like to create awareness through Alexa Voice Application Program on ozone pollution. Our Alexa app will address four UN-SDG, good health, clean air, and clean energy for a sustainable planet.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
